gui

Class PreviewShapePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.PreviewShapePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PreviewShapePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Class PreviewShapePanel. Draws a preview of style of marking to left of given parent position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PreviewShapePanel

        public PreviewShapePanel(float thickness,
                         float opacity,
                         int shapeID,
                         int shapeSize,
                         java.awt.Color color,
                         java.awt.Rectangle recOfBackPanel,
                         java.awt.Rectangle recOfVisibleWindow)
        Instantiates a new preview shape panel. Height will be taken from given Rectangle recOfBackPanel.
        Parameters:
        thickness - the thickness of the shape
        opacity - the opacity of the shape
        shapeID - the id of the shape
        shapeSize - the size of the shape
        color - the color of the shape
        recOfBackPanel - the Rectangle of visible dialog
        recOfVisibleWindow - the Rectangle of the whole visible window
